Name: Salmon-Stuffed Avocados
Description: Canned salmon is a valuable pantry staple and a practical way to include heart-healthy, omega-3-rich fish in your diet. Here, we combine it with avocados in an easy no-cook meal.
Ingridients: ½ cup nonfat plain Greek yogurt

Name: Kale & White Bean Potpie with Chive Biscuits
Description: In this vegetarian white bean potpie recipe, kale and hearty white beans are topped with easy, homemade chive biscuits. If desired, add a little shredded Gruyère or Cheddar cheese to the biscuit dough.
Ingridients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil plus 2 teaspoons, divided
2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme or 3/4 teaspoon dried

Name: Edamame Hummus Wrap
Description: Made with protein-rich edamame instead of chickpeas, this easy hummus recipe is the perfect vegetarian filling for a grab-and-go wrap. Or double the recipe and use the hummus for a healthy snack with cut-up vegetables.
Ingridients: 12 ounces frozen shelled edamame (about 2 1/4 cups), thawed
2 cups very thinly sliced green cabbage

Name: Cheesy Chipotle-Cauliflower Mac
Description: You'll barely notice the cauliflower in this comforting skillet pasta--it's pureed and mixed into the creamy cheese sauce.
Ingridients: 8 ounces whole-wheat fusilli or rotini pasta
1 chipotle pepper in adobo, minced, plus 1 tablespoon adobo sauce
¼ cup finely chopped yellow onion

Name: Slow-Cooker Overnight Barley Porridge
Description: At 6 grams per 1-cup serving, barley is high in fiber compared to many other whole grains. And it has high levels of prebiotic fiber, making it great for promoting healthy gut bacteria. Like oats, barley contains beta-glucans, a type of soluble fiber that's been shown to improve blood pressure and cholesterol levels.
Ingridients: 8 cups unsweetened oat milk or other nondairy milk or water

Name: Summer Vegetable Gnocchi Salad
Description: This riff on pasta salad is best served warm while the gnocchi are nice and tender. Plus, the grilled veggies taste extra-good fresh off the fire in this easy gnocchi recipe.
Ingridients: 1 small eggplant, sliced lengthwise into 1/2-inch planks
1 medium zucchini, sliced lengthwise into 1/2-inch planks
1 medium yellow squash, sliced lengthwise into 1/2-inch planks
½ medium red onion, cut into 1/2-inch-thick rings

Name: Veggie & Hummus Sandwich
Description: This mile-high vegetable and hummus sandwich makes the perfect heart-healthy vegetarian lunch to go. Mix it up with different flavors of hummus and different types of vegetables depending on your mood.
Ingridients: ¼ medium red bell pepper, sliced

Name: Chipotle Chicken Quinoa Burrito Bowl
Description: This flavorful burrito bowl features grilled chicken coated in a spicy chipotle glaze. Loading it with vegetables and using quinoa in place of rice adds nutrition for a healthier dinner.
Ingridients: 1 tablespoon finely chopped chipotle peppers in adobo sauce1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil
¼ cup prepared pico de gallo or other salsa
¼ cup shredded Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese

Name: White Bean & Avocado Toast
Description: These hearty vegan tacos are quick and easy to make, perfect for busy weeknights. They are so tasty no one will miss the meat or dairy.
Ingridients: ½ cup canned white beans, rinsed and drained

Name: Roasted Vegetable & Black Bean Tacos
Description: These hearty vegan tacos are quick and easy to make, perfect for busy weeknights. They are so tasty no one will miss the meat or dairy.
Ingridients: 1 cup roasted root vegetables (see associated recipe)
½ cup cooked or canned black beans, rinsed
4 corn tortillas, lightly toasted or warmed
Chopped fresh cilantro & salsa for garnish
